title: Your pictures on the theme of 'home comforts'
content: We asked our readers to send in their best pictures on the theme "home comforts". Here are some of the photographs we received from around the world.The next theme is "misty mornings", and the deadline for entries is 7 December 2021.The pictures will be published later that week and you will be able to find them, along with other galleries,on the In Pictures section of the website. <https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/in_pictures>You can upload your entries on this page <https://www.bbc.co.uk/send/u66493150> or email them to yourpics@bbc.co.uk.Terms and conditions <https://www.bbc.co.uk/terms> apply. Further details and themes are at: We set the theme, you take the pictures. <https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-10768282>All photographs subject to copyright.
